basics.name: Dr. Evelyn Reed
basics.label: Computational Linguist
basics.summary: A distinguished computational linguist with over 15 years of experience in natural language processing, machine learning, and AI-driven linguistic analysis. Expert in developing algorithms that power next-generation language technologies.

work.summary: Lead a team of researchers in developing state-of-the-art NLP models for semantic search and text summarization. Published key findings in top-tier journals and conferences.
Developed and deployed machine translation systems that improved translation accuracy by 30%. Worked on syntactic parsing and named entity recognition components.
